Detailed Description

Just an interface class to allow an application to initialize before being scheduled.

It provides an init method which shall be overwritten by the applications init() method. The init() method will be invoked before the execution of any thread is started.

virtual void RODOS::Initiator::init ( void  ) [inline, protected, virtual]

Called by the iniator only once for each object in the system at start up.

Called before scheduling von threads beginns.
